# Plugin API Reference

<!-- test: test_router_edge_cases.py::test_builtin_plugins_registered -->

This section documents the built-in plugins provided by SmartRoute.

For additional reference, see:

- [LLM API Details](https://github.com/genropy/smartroute/blob/main/llm-docs/API-DETAILS.md#plugin-api) - Complete plugin API reference
- Scope/channel policies are available via SmartPublisher (`smartpublisher.smartroute_plugins.publish.PublishPlugin`).

## Auto-Generated Plugin API

```{eval-rst}
.. automodule:: smartroute.plugins.logging
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

.. automodule:: smartroute.plugins.pydantic
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
```
